channel.title: Windows-10 on credibleDEV
channel.description: Recent content in Windows-10 on credibleDEV

item.title: Managed Desktop Icons and Shortcuts in Intune
item.description: Managing desktop icons and shortcuts in Intune isn't straightforward but there are PowerShell scripts to help make this easy.

item.title: Deploy HKCU Registry Keys Using Intune
item.description: Deploying registry keys to the HKCU hive in Intune isn't straightforward. This guide will show you how to deploy keys to the current user hive.

item.title: PowerShell Force Compliance Baseline Evaluation
item.description: Forcing a SCCM compliance rule is easy to do but you may not know how. This guide explains how PowerShell can be used to force this.
